channel.title: CTM (Center For Talented Meese) - DJC ( feat. friends Anton Chiu and Peter Koenig) [Hip hop]
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I was recently at a three-week summerschool camp called CTY (center for talented youth). When I told my hallmates I made electronic music, two of them got excited and wanted to make a rap with me. I made the hip-hop beat and they provided the lyrics and vocals. We called it CTM (Center for Talented _Meese_) because our hall was nicknamed the Meese( plural of moose ;)))) ). It has lots of basketball references as well as references to the things we experienced at summerschool. Hope you guys enjoy!
(The vocals aren't very good quality bc of lack of a real recording mic)
[https://soundcloud.com/djc_official/ctm-center-for-talented-meese](https://soundcloud.com/djc_official/ctm-center-for-talented-meese)
